welcome:
Hi, i'm smiles bot.
I can give you some information about organic compound.
Also I can try to find some similar smiles in my library.
You can help me. If you want, you can upload some your csv files with to our base
HELP_QUESTION: What about me you want to know?
info_about_info_search:
I can give you some information about organic compound:
	-Molecular wight
	-Count of ring
	-Count of hydrogen bond donors
	-Count of hydrogen bond acceptors
	-Whether Lipinski rule
	-picture of organic compound
info_about_similar_search: I can try to find similar smiles in my library. Now my database is small, but you can upload some now csv files and we updata our base.
help_button_info: Smiles Information, what I can to give you
type_error: Sorry, but you send not csv file. Resend, please
